parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Product
parameters.description: The code of the cloud service.

parameters.name: QueryDurationMs
parameters.description: The execution duration of slow SQL queries. Minimum value: **1000**. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss format. The time must be in UTC.
